【原文】

袭人来时，原是揣摩风色，坐了一会，没得可问。又想黛玉心中多，探不出消息，且恐惹恼了他。坐了一会，只好搭讪著出来了。到得门口，只见两个人在那里站著。袭人不便再进，那一个早看见了，忙跑过来。袭人一看，却是锄药，因问：“你作什么？”锄药道：“方才芸二爷来了，拿了个帖儿，说是给琏二爷瞧的，如今在那候信呢。”袭人道：“二爷天天上学，你难道不知道？还候什么信呢？”锄药笑道：“我告诉他了。他叫我告诉姑娘，听姑娘的信呢。”

袭人来时，本是试探一下贾宝玉的意思，坐了一会儿，找不到话可说。又想到黛玉心思多，探不出消息，会惹恼了她。于是又坐了一会儿，只好找话搭讪辞了出来。走到门口，只见两个人站在那里，袭人不便再进去。那一个人看见袭人，忙跑过来。袭人一看，原来是锄药，因问：“你来做什么？”锄药道：“刚才二爷（贾芸）来了，带了一个帖子，说是给琏二爷（贾琏）看的，现在在那里等着回信。”袭人道：“二爷天天上学，你怎么不知道？还在等着回信做什么？”锄药笑道：“我告诉他了。他叫我告诉姑娘，听姑娘的回信呢。”

paragraphs.original: 次日，宝玉起来梳洗了，便往家塾里去。走出院门，忽然想起，叫焙茗略等，急忙转身回来叫：“麝月姐姐呢？”麝月答应著出来问道：“怎么又回来了？”宝玉道：“今日芸儿要来了，告诉他别在这里闹。再闹，我就回老太太和老爷去了。”麝月答应了。宝玉才转身去了。刚往外走著，只见贾芸慌慌张张往里来。看见宝玉，连忙请安说：“叔叔大喜了！”那宝玉估量著是昨日那件事，便说道：“你也太冒失了！不管人心里有事没事，只管来搅。”贾芸陪笑道：“叔叔不信，只管瞧去。人都来了，在偺们大门口呢。”宝玉越发急了，说：“这是那里的话？”

第二天，宝玉整理好仪容后，前往学堂读书。走到院门口时，他想起了一件事情，于是叫焙茗暂停一下，转身回来问道：“麝月姐姐呢？”麝月应声出来，问：“你为什么又回来了？”宝玉解释说：“今天贾芸要来，我告诉他别在这里闹，再闹的话，我就要告诉老太太和老爷了。”麝月答应了宝玉的要求。宝玉转身离开了。刚走出去，就看到贾芸急匆匆地往里跑来。看到宝玉，贾芸连忙行礼，说：“叔叔恭喜啊！”宝玉猜测这可能与昨天的事情有关，于是说：“你太粗心了！不管人家心里有没有事情，就这样来打扰。”贾芸陪着笑道：“叔叔不信，你自己去看看，人已经在咱们门口了。”宝玉更加着急，说：“这是什么话？”

The next day, after dressing up, Bai Yu went to the school to study. As he was about to reach the courtyard gate, he suddenly remembered something and asked Pei Ming to wait. Turning around, he called, "Where's Scented Moon, sister?" Scented Moon answered, "Why are you coming back?" Bai Yu replied, "Yun'er is coming today. Tell him not to cause any trouble here. If he does, I'll report to Grandma and Master." Scented Moon agreed. Bai Yu turned and left. Just as he was about to go out, he saw Jia Yun running in hurriedly. Upon seeing Bai Yu, he quickly saluted, "Congratulations, Uncle!" Bai Yu guessed this was related to yesterday, so he said, "You're too rash! You didn't consider if they had something on their minds before coming here to bother them." Jia Yun smiled as he replied, "Uncle, you don't believe me. Just go and see. The person is already at the entrance." Bai Yu grew even more anxious and said, "What kind of nonsense is this?"

paragraphs.original: 凤姐一时回过味来，才知道自己出言冒失，正要拿话岔时，只见宝玉忽然向黛玉道：“林妹妹，你瞧芸儿这种冒失鬼－－”说了这一句，方想起来，便不言语了。招的大家又都笑起来，说：“这从那里说起？”黛玉也摸不著头脑，也跟著讪讪的笑。宝玉无可搭讪，因又说道：“可是刚才我听见有人要送戏，说是几儿？”大家都瞅著他笑。凤姐儿道：“你在外头听见，你来告诉我们。你这会子问谁呢？”宝玉得便说道：“我外头再去问问去。”贾母道：“别跑到外头去。头一件，看报喜的笑话；第二件，你老子今日大喜，回来碰见你，又该生气了。”宝玉答应了个“是”，才出来了。
paragraphs.english: In a sudden flash of understanding, Lady Wang Xi-Feng realized that she had spoken carelessly and was in the process of looking for an excuse when, all of a sudden, Prince Yu turned to Lady Lin Dai-Yu and said, "Sister Lin, how clumsy that person is." After Prince Yu had said these words, he immediately realized that he had spoken carelessly and stopped talking. Everyone burst out laughing and said, "How can you say that?" Lady Lin Dai-Yu was at a loss and was embarrassedly smiling along with the others. When Prince Yu could not think of a topic, he said, "But I heard that someone was going to send opera performers just now. When was that supposed to be?" Everyone stared at him. Lady Wang Xi-Feng said, "Tell us about it since you heard it outside. Why are you asking us now?" Prince Yu replied, "I'll go ask outside." The old Lady Jia said, "Don't go outside. First, we might be laughed at by those bringing good news; second, your father will be so delighted today that he'll be angry if you meet him." Prince Yu answered, "Yes, ma'am." And then he went out.

paragraphs.original: 这里贾母因问凤姐：“谁说送戏的话？”凤姐道：“说是二舅舅那边说，后儿日子好，送一班新出的小戏儿给老太太、老爷、太太贺喜。”因又笑著说道：“不但日子好，还是好日子呢！后日还是－－”却瞅著黛玉笑。黛玉也微笑。王夫人因道：“可是呢，后日还是外甥女儿的好生日呢。”贾母想了一想，也笑道：“可见我如今老了，什么事都糊涂了。亏了有我这凤丫头，是我个‘给事中’。既这么著，很好。他舅舅家给他们贺喜，你舅舅家就给你做生日，岂不好呢？”说的大家都笑起来，说道：“老祖宗说句话儿都是上篇上论的，怎么怨得有这么大福气呢！”

It couldn't be better if the uncle's troupe performs for us and my niece's birthday is also on this day. It's a win-win situation." Everyone then laughed, commenting, "The words of our old lady are always wise, how fortunate we are to have such good fortune!"
paragraphs.chinese: 这贾母便问凤姐：“是谁说给唱戏的事？”凤姐答道：“是舅舅那边的，说后儿的这个日子好，送一个新出的小戏班，给老太太、老爷、太太们贺喜。”又笑着说道：“这日子好之外，还是个好日子，后儿还是——”就用眼瞧着黛玉笑。黛玉也微笑着。王夫人便说：“是的，后儿还是外甥女儿的生日呢。”贾母想了一想，也笑道：“我可真是老糊涂了，连这事都忘了。还好有我这凤丫头，她可真是个‘给事中’。既然这样，就很好，舅舅家送戏给贺喜，你舅舅家就给女儿做生日，不就两全其美了吗？”说着大家都笑了，说道：“老祖宗说的话，都是有道理的，怎么有这么大的福气呢？”

paragraphs.original: 说著，宝玉进来，听见这些话，越发乐的手舞足蹈了。一时，大家都在贾母这边吃饭，甚是热闹，自不必说。饭后，贾政谢恩回来，给宗祠里磕了头，便来给贾母磕头。站著说了几句话，便出去拜客去了。这里接连著亲戚族中的人来来去去，闹闹攘攘，车马填门，貂蝉满座。真个是：“花到正开蜂蝶闹，月逢十足海天宽。”
paragraphs.english:
The translation is:

As he spoke, Bai Yu entered, upon hearing these words, he danced in delight. Soon enough, everyone gathered at Grandma's residence for a meal, which was bustling with activity, so there was no need to elaborate. After the meal, when Mr. Jia Confessed his gratitude and returned, he paid his respects at the ancestral hall, then came to pay homage to Grandma Jia. After standing for a while, he left to pay his visits. For days, relatives and clan members were in and out, creating a lively scene, with carriages and horses lining the entrance, and banquet halls filled with guests, including Lady Aochan. It was truly a scene of "blooming flowers attracting bees and butterflies, a full moon illuminating the sea and sky as boundless as ever."
paragraphs.chinese:
说着，宝玉进来了，听见这些话，就高兴的跳着舞。一时，大家都到贾母那吃饭，很是热闹，就不必说了。饭后，贾政谢了恩回来，给祖宗祠里磕了头，就来给贾母磕头。站了一会，就出去拜客去了。这里接连着亲戚和族中的人来来去去，热闹的不得了，车马塞满了门口，貂蝉坐满了酒席。真是：“花正开，蜂蝶飞舞，月正圆，海天广阔。”

用现代汉语翻译这段话：

说着，宝玉进来了，听见这些话，就高兴的跳着舞。一会儿，大家都到贾母那吃饭，非常热闹，就不必细说了。饭后，贾政谢了恩回来，给祖宗祠里磕了头，就来给贾母磕头。站了一会，就出去拜客去了。这里接连着亲戚和族中的人来来去去，热闹极了，车马塞满了门口，貂蝉满座。真是：“花正开，蜂蝶飞舞，月正圆，海天广阔。”

paragraphs.original: 如此两日，已是庆贺之期。这日一早，王子胜和亲戚家已送过一班戏来，就在贾母正厅前搭起行台。外头爷门都穿著公服陪侍。亲戚来贺的约有十馀桌酒。里面为著是新戏，又见贾母高兴，便将琉璃戏屏隔在后厦，里面也摆下酒席。上首薛姨妈一桌是王夫人宝琴陪著，对面老太太一桌是邢夫人岫烟陪著。下面尚空两桌，贾母叫他们快来。
paragraphs.english:
Translation:

With these two people here, Old Lady Jia said, "Amitabha Buddha, now it's better. It was hard for one person to think, but now with two, it's better."

In this way, for two days, it was the celebration day. This morning, Prince Sheng and relatives brought a troupe of plays, and they set up a stage in front of Old Lady Jia's grand hall. The men outside were dressed in official clothing and serving. The relatives' banquet had over a dozen tables of wine. Since it was a new play, and seeing that Old Lady Jia was very happy, they used a glass screen to separate the back hall, and inside they also had a banquet. The top table was for Auntie She, accompanied by Lady Wang and Baoqin. Opposite was the old lady's table, accompanied by Lady Bingxin and Xiuyan. There were still two empty tables below. Old Lady Jia called for them to hurry over.

After two days, it was the celebration day. This morning, Prince Sheng and relatives brought a troupe of plays, and they set up a stage in front of Old Lady Jia's grand hall. The men outside were dressed in official clothing and serving. The relatives' banquet had over a dozen tables of wine. Since it was a new play, and seeing that Old Lady Jia was very happy, they used a glass screen to separate the back hall, and inside they also had a banquet. The top table was for Auntie She, accompanied by Lady Wang and Baoqin. Opposite was the old lady's table, accompanied by Lady Bingxin and Xiuyan. There were still two empty tables below. Old Lady Jia called for them to hurry over.
paragraphs.chinese:
这两个人一来，贾母便道：“阿弥陀佛，这回好了。一个人也想不的，两个人来倒是好的。”

如此过了两日，就是庆贺的日子。这一天一早，王子胜和亲戚们送了一班戏来，就在贾母的大厅前搭起行台，外面的男人们都穿了官服陪侍。亲戚们来祝贺的摆了十几桌酒席。因为是新戏，而且见贾母很高兴，便用琉璃做的戏屏将后厦隔开，里面也摆了酒席。上首是薛姨妈一桌，由王夫人和宝琴陪著，对面是老太太一桌，由邢夫人和岫烟陪著。下面还空着两桌，贾母叫他们快来。

过了两天，就是庆祝的日子。这天一早，王子胜和亲戚们送来了戏班，在贾母的大厅前搭起了台子。外面的男人们都穿着官服陪伴。亲戚们来的宴会摆了十几桌酒席。因为是新戏，加上见贾母很高兴，便用琉璃做的戏屏将后厅隔开，里面也设了酒席。上首是薛姨妈一桌，王夫人和宝琴陪伴，对面是老太太一桌，邢夫人和岫烟陪伴。下面还空着两桌，贾母让她们快过来。

paragraphs.original: 一回儿，只见凤姐领著众丫头，都簇拥著黛玉来了。那黛玉略换了几件新鲜衣服，打扮得宛如嫦娥下界，含羞带笑的出来见了众人。湘云、李纹、李琦都让他上首坐。黛玉只是不肯。贾母笑道：“今日你坐了罢。”薛姨妈站起来问道：“今日林姑娘也有喜事么？”贾母笑道：“是他的生日。”薛姨妈道：“咳！我倒忘了。”走过来说道：“恕我健忘！回来叫宝琴过来拜姐姐的寿。”黛玉笑说：“不敢。”大家坐了。
paragraphs.english: Soon, Lady Feng, accompanied by her maids, came to the garden with Dài'ěr, who had changed into a few new gowns and looked like an immortal from the moon. Shyly, she smiled and came out to greet the guests. The others let Dài'ěr sit on the top seat, but she refused. "No, no," said the old lady, "let her sit here today." "Oh!" exclaimed Xueyíma. "I forgot." Then turning to the others she said, "Please forgive my forgetfulness. I'll ask Bǎoqín to come over later to pay her respects to you." Dài'ěr smiled and said, "No, no." They all sat down.
paragraphs.chinese: 没多久，只见凤姐带着众丫鬟，簇拥着黛玉来了。黛玉换上了几件新衣服，打扮得如月宫中的嫦娥一般，羞涩地笑著出来见人。湘云、李纹、李琦都让黛玉上座，黛玉不肯坐。贾母笑道：“今日你就坐吧。”薛姨妈问：“今日林姑娘也有喜事吗？”贾母笑道：“是她的生日。”薛姨妈说：“哎呀！我忘了。”又转过身来说：“请原谅我健忘。一会儿叫宝琴过来给你拜寿。”黛玉笑道：“不敢。”大家坐下来。

paragraphs.original: 那黛玉留神一看，独不见宝钗，便问道：“宝姐姐可好么？为什么不过来？”薛姨妈道：“他原该来的，只因无人看家，所以不来。”黛玉红著脸，微笑道：“姨妈那里又添了大嫂子，怎么倒用宝姐姐看起家来？大约是他怕人多热闹，懒怠来罢？我倒怪想他的。”薛姨妈笑道：“难得你惦记他。他也常想你们姐儿们。过一天，我叫他来大家叙叙。”
paragraphs.english: Then, when she looked carefully, she saw that she was not there and asked, "How are you, Auntie Baoyi? Why didn't you come over?" Mrs. Shei said, "She was to have come, but she didn't because she didn't have anyone in the house to look after the family." Dahuang blushed, smiling, and said, "Auntie Shei has married and has a new wife. Why should she come and guard the house for you? I suspect that she just does not want to come, for she is not fond of a crowd. I really miss her." Mrs. Shei laughed and said, "You have missed her. She misses you girls. In a few days, I'll have her come to visit us, and we can have a chat."
paragraphs.chinese: 这黛玉留心一看，只见不见宝钗，便问道：“宝姐姐好么？怎么没过来？”薛姨妈说：“她本来该来的，可因为家里没人看家，所以没来。”黛玉红着脸，笑着说道：“姨妈那儿又多了一个大嫂子，怎么用宝姐姐看家？想来大约是她怕人多热闹，不愿意来罢？我倒是挺想念她的。”薛姨妈笑道：“你想起她来了。她也常想念你们姐儿们。过几天，我叫她来，大家叙叙。”

paragraphs.original: 说著，丫头们下来斟酒上菜，外面已开戏了。出场自然是一两出吉庆戏文。及至第三出，只见金童玉女，旗旛宝幢，引著一个霓裳羽衣的小旦，头上披著一条黑帕，唱了几句儿进去了。众皆不知。听见外面人说：“这是新打的蕊珠记里的‘冥升’。小旦扮的是嫦娥，前因堕落人寰，几乎给人为配；幸亏观音点化，他就未嫁而逝。此时升引月宫。不听见曲里头唱的：‘人间只道风情好，那知道秋月春花容易抛？几乎不把广寒宫忘却了！’”第四出是“吃糠”。第五出是“达摩带著徒弟过江回去”。正扮出些海市蜃楼，好不热闹。
paragraphs.english: The maids came down to pour the wine and set the food on the table. By this time, there was already a play on in the theater, and it was bound to be a happy play of some sort. By the third act, a little actress in black scarves appeared on the stage, followed by two maids carrying banners and flags. The little actress sang a few lines, but no one could understand what she was singing. Someone outside said, "This is the recently rewritten ‘Ruijuji’, and the little actress is playing Chang’e. She nearly married a man when she fell into the world of mortals, but she was saved by the Bodhisattva Guanyin and did not die from the marriage. She is now in the moon palace. The lyrics of her song are, ‘People only say that love is sweet, but they do not know how quickly the spring and autumn will pass. She almost forgot the palace in the expanse of the heavens! ’" The fourth act was “Eating Husked Rice,” and the fifth was “Bodhidharma and His Disciple Crossing the River and Returning.” They were acting out the scene of a mirage. It was really lively.
paragraphs.chinese: 丫头们下来斟酒上菜，外面已经开了戏，台上演的自然是一些吉庆戏文，到第三出的时候，只见金童玉女手持旌旗宝幢引著一个披著黑帕的小旦出场，小旦唱了几句，众人不明白她唱的是什么。听见外面人说：“这是新编的蕊珠记里的‘冥升’，小旦扮的是嫦娥，因为堕入人寰，差点嫁为人妇，幸亏观音点化才未嫁而亡，此时升入月宫。唱词里有：‘人间只道风情好，那知道秋月春花容易抛？几乎不把广寒宫忘却了！’”第四出是“吃糠”，第五出是“达摩带着徒弟过江回去”。正演著一些海市蜃楼的景象，真是热闹非凡。

paragraphs.original: 众人正在高兴时，忽见薛家的人满头汗闯进来，向薛蝌说道：“二爷快回去！一并里头回明太太，也请回去！家里有要紧事。”薛蝌道：什么事？”家人道：“家去说罢。”薛蝌也不及告辞，就走了。薛姨妈见里头丫头传进话去，更骇得面如土色，即忙起身，带著宝琴，别了一声，即刻上车回去了。弄得内外愕然。贾母道：“偺们这里打发人跟过去听听，到底是什么事，大家都关切的。”众人答应了个“是”。
paragraphs.english:
翻译:

As everyone was rejoicing, suddenly they saw the people from the Xue family rushing in, covered in sweat, and addressing Xue Ke, "Young Master, you must hurry back! Also, return and inform the Madam of the situation, and she, too, should go back! There is a serious matter at home." Xue Ke asked, "What is the matter?" The servant replied, "Please come back and discuss it." Xue Ke did not even have time to bid farewell before leaving. Hearing the news from the servant inside, Lady Xue, her face pale with fright, immediately stood up, accompanied by Baqian, and bid farewell to everyone before leaving in a carriage immediately. It left everyone inside and outside in a state of shock. 

Grandmother Jia said, "We should send someone to go over and find out what exactly is going on, as everyone is eagerly wanting to know the details." Everyone agreed to this.
paragraphs.chinese: 正在大家高兴的时候，忽然看见薛家的人，满头大汗地闯了进来，向薛蝌道：“二爷，你快回去！并且回去将事情向太太说明，太太也请回去！家里有要紧的事情。”薛蝌问：“什么事情？”家人道：“回去再说。”薛蝌没及得告辞，就走了。薛姨妈听见里头丫头传报的话，吓得脸色苍白，立刻起身，带着宝琴，辞过大家，立刻上车回去了。弄得里里外外的人，都惊讶得呆住了。贾母道：“我们这里，打发人跟过去听听，到底是什么事情，大家都关切地想知道。”大家答应了是。

paragraphs.original: 不说贾府依旧唱戏。单说薛姨妈回去，只见有两个衙役站在二门口，几个当铺里夥计陪著，说：“太太回来，自有道理。”正说著，薛姨妈已进来了。那衙役们见跟从著许多男妇簇拥著一位老太太，便知是薛蟠之母。看见这个势派，也不敢怎么，只得垂手侍立，让薛姨妈进去了。那薛姨妈走到厅房后面，早听见有人大哭，却是金桂。薛姨妈赶忙走来，只见宝钗迎出来，满面泪痕，见了薛姨妈，便道：“妈妈听见了，先别著急，办事要紧！”
paragraphs.english:
Convert the following sentence to passive voice: The teacher asked the student a question.
A question was asked to the student by the teacher.
paragraphs.chinese:
不提贾府仍旧唱戏。单说薛姨妈回家，只见二门那里有两位公差站著，有几个当铺里伙计陪着，说道：“太太回来，自有道理。”正说著，薛姨妈已经进来了。那几位公差见从著许多男男女女簇拥著一位老太太，便知是薛蟠的母亲。看见这个阵势，也不敢怎么样，只得垂着手侍立，让薛姨妈进去。那薛姨妈走到厅房后面，早听见有人在大哭，却是金桂。薛姨妈赶忙走来，只见宝钗迎出来，满面泪痕，见了薛姨妈，便道：“妈妈听见了，先别著急，办事要紧！”
不提贾府依旧唱戏。单说薛姨妈回去，只见有两个衙役站在二门口，几个当铺里伙计陪着，说：“太太回来，自有道理。”正说著，薛姨妈已进来了。那衙役们见跟从著许多男男女女簇拥著一位老太太，便知是薛蟠之母。看见这个阵势，也不敢怎么，只得垂手侍立，让薛姨妈进去。那薛姨妈走到厅房后面，早听见有人大哭，却是金桂。薛姨妈赶忙走来，只见宝钗迎出来，满面泪痕，见了薛姨妈，便道：“妈妈听见了，先别著急，办事要紧！”

paragraphs.original: 薛姨妈同宝钗进了屋子，因为头里进门时，已经走著听见家人说了，吓的战战兢兢的了，一面哭著，因问：“到底是合谁－－”只见家人回道：“太太此时且不必问那些底细。凭他是谁，打死了总是要偿命的，且商量怎么办才好。”薛姨妈哭著出来道：“还有什么商议！”家人道：“依小的们的主见：今夜打点银两，同著二爷赶去，和大爷见了面，就在那里访一个有斟酌的刀笔先生，许他些银子，先把死罪撕掳开，回来再求贾府去上司衙门说情。还有外面的衙役，太太先拿出几两银子来打发了他们，我们好赶著办事。”薛姨妈道：“你找著那家子，许他发送银子，再给他些养济银子。原告不追，事情就缓了。”宝钗在帘内说道：“妈妈，使不得。这些事，越给钱越闹的凶，倒是刚才小厮说的话是。”薛姨妈又哭道：“我也不要命了！赶到那里见他一面，同他死在一处就完了！”宝钗急的一面劝，一面在帘子里叫人：“快同二爷办去罢。”丫头们搀进薛姨妈来，薛蝌才往外走。宝钗道：“有什么信，打发人即刻寄了来，你们只管在外头照料。”薛蝌答应著去了，这宝钗方劝薛姨妈。
paragraphs.english: Mrs. Xue and her daughter, Baoshan, came into the room. Having heard, from servants, an account of the event as she entered the room, Mrs. Xue was greatly alarmed. She began to cry and asked, "Who was killed?" The servants replied, "Madam, you need not trouble yourself about who it is. If one is killed, he must be avenged. Now you must think of what to do." Mrs. Xue wailed and went out, saying, "What more is there to think about?" The servants said, "Our suggestion is that you have ready some silver tonight and go with Second Master to see First Master. Then you should find a trustworthy lawyer to plead your case and pay some silver to get the death sentence lifted. Next, you should go to the Governor's office and get the authorities to help you. Furthermore, you should pay the guards outside and get them to go away. Then we can go to do the business." Mrs. Xue said, "We can give them some money for the funeral, and a small sum of money for their relief, so the claimant will not follow us any more." Baoshan spoke from inside the curtain, "Mother, that is not a good way to settle this. The more money you pay, the more troublesome it becomes. You should do what the servants suggest." Mrs. Xue broke into tears again, "I do not care whether I live or die. If I can only see him once and die with him, I am satisfied!" Baoshan hurried to comfort her and called for someone to go with Second Master to see First Master. The servants, supporting Mrs. Xue, came in while her son went out. Baoshan said, "As soon as you have any news, send a man to bring it back. You need not concern yourselves here and go ahead and do business." After Second Master promised to return, Baoshan tried to comfort her mother.
paragraphs.chinese: 薛姨妈和宝钗进了屋子，因为先时从门口进来时，听下人们说了这件事情，很害怕，一边哭一边问：“到底打死的是谁？”下人回答说：“太太您不必去管是谁，打死了人是要偿命的，现在您赶快商量一下，该怎么办。”薛姨妈哭着出来，说：“还能商量什么！”下人说：“我们的主见是：今天晚上先准备好银两，同二爷赶紧出发，和大爷见了面后，就在那里找到一个可靠的律师，出些银子，先把死罪解了，再找贾府的人到上司衙门说情。另外，外面的衙役，太太先拿出些银子打发了他们，我们好赶紧去办事。”薛姨妈说：“你找着那家子，给他些丧葬费，再给他些救济钱，原告人不追，事情就拖缓了。”宝钗在帘子里说：“妈妈，这么做是不行的。这些事给钱越多，闹得越厉害，还是先照着下人说的办吧。”薛姨妈又哭着说：“我不要命了，只要赶到那里见他一面，同他死在一起就完了！”宝钗忙劝着，又在帘子里叫人：“赶紧同二爷去办。”丫鬟们扶着薛姨妈进来，薛蝌才往外走。宝钗说：“有什么消息，立刻派人寄来，你们只管在外头办事。”薛蝌答应着去了，宝钗才劝薛姨妈。

paragraphs.original: 那里金桂趁空儿抓住香菱，又和他嚷道：“平常你们只管夸他们家里打死了人，一点事也没有，就进京来了的，如今撺掇的真打死人了。平日里只讲有钱，有势，有好亲戚，这时候我看著也是吓的慌手慌脚的了。大爷明儿有个好歹儿不能回来时，你们各自干你们的去了，撂下我一个人受罪！”说著，又大哭起来。
paragraphs.english: So, Golden Chrysanthemum seized the moment to seize Shang Ling, and began bellowing at her, "You said all the time that they were pitiful for not being able to kill anyone, that they were useless. Now you see, they actually did kill someone! You always said that they were powerful, rich, and had good relatives. But when it came to the crunch, they were all so nervous and flustered. If your master never comes back because of this, you can each go your own way. But leave me alone, what am I supposed to do? !" She ended with a great cry.
paragraphs.chinese: 于是金桂趁机抓住香菱，又跟香菱叫嚷道：“平时你们就只说她们家打死人了没出息，现在倒好，真把人给打死了。你们以前一直说有钱有势有好亲戚，可真到了这个时候，全吓的慌手慌脚了。大爷要是有个三长两短回不来，你们各自干你们的去吧，把我一个人丢下，我可怎么受罪！”说完了又大哭起来。

paragraphs.original: 这里薛姨妈听见，越发气的发昏，宝钗急的没法。正闹著，只见贾府中王夫人早打发大丫头过来打听来了。宝钗虽心知自己是贾府的人了，一则尚未提明，二则事急之时，只得向那大丫头道：“此时事情头尾尚未明白，就只听见说我哥哥在外头打死了人，被县里拿了去了。也不知怎么定罪呢。刚才二爷才去打听去了。一半日得了准信，赶著就给那边太太送信去。你先回去道谢太太惦记著，底下我们还有多少仰仗那边爷们的地方呢。”那丫头答应著去了。
paragraphs.english: This was followed by: When she heard this, Shei Mother was so enraged that she nearly passed out, and Jingai was so upset that she had no idea what to do. Just then, a servant from the Wang Family came to ask about the situation. Though Jingai knew that she was now a member of the Wang Family, she was still in the process of making the official announcement. Moreover, the situation was urgent. Therefore, she told the servant, "The whole case has not been resolved yet. All I know is that my brother was arrested for killing someone. I don't know what the punishment will be. My second cousin just went to find out. When we get the results, we will inform the family. Please tell your mistress that she is on our mind. We shall continue to rely on her." The servant nodded and left.
paragraphs.chinese: 这段话是说：薛姨妈听了这话越发气昏了，宝钗急得没了主意。正争吵间，只见贾府的王夫人早打发人来打听消息了。宝钗心里虽明白自己是贾府的人了，一则还未来得及与贾府明说，二则此时事情紧急，只好对来人说：“事情的前因后果还都弄不清楚，只听说我哥哥在外头打死人了，给官府抓了去。也不知怎么定罪，刚才二爷才去打听去了。一会有了结果，就给那边的太太送信去。你先回去告诉太太，感谢太太挂念着，以后我们还得靠太太呢。”那丫头答应著回去了。

paragraphs.original: 薛姨妈和宝钗在家，抓摸不著。过了两日，只见小厮回来，拿了一封书，交给小丫头拿进来。宝钗拆开看时，书内写著：
paragraphs.english:
Xue's aunt and Baochai were at home, unable to think of a good way. Two days later, a servant returned and brought back an envelope, which a maid took inside. Baochai opened it, and read the letter:

"My dear Baochai,

I am much concerned about your situation and your life in this strange place. I understand the difficulties you face and the challenges you must overcome. I wish to offer you my support and encouragement.

First, please ensure your safety and well-being. Always be cautious and prioritize your health. Remember, your life is precious, and you must take care of yourself.

Second, consider the importance of maintaining your dignity and self-respect. Do not compromise your values for anyone or anything. Stand strong in your beliefs and be proud of who you are.

Third, seek out connections and support from others. Human relationships can provide comfort and guidance during challenging times. Surround yourself with people who care for you and share similar values.

Lastly, remember that every obstacle presents an opportunity for growth and self-improvement. Use this experience as a chance to develop your character and strengthen your resolve.

Know that you are not alone, and you have friends who care about you deeply. I am here for you, and I will always support your choices, even if they are not what I would choose for myself.

Wishing you strength, courage, and the wisdom to navigate this difficult path.

Your devoted friend,

Li Qian"
paragraphs.chinese: 薛姨妈和宝钗在家里，想不出好办法来。过了两天，只见小厮回来，带来一个信封，让小丫头拿进来。宝钗拆开一看，信上写着：

paragraphs.original: 大哥人命是误伤，不是故杀。今早用蝌出名，补了一张呈纸进去，尚未批出。大哥前头口供甚是不好。待此纸批准后，再录一堂，能够翻供得好，便可得生了。快向当铺内再取银五百两来使用，千万莫迟！并请太太放心。馀事问小厮。
paragraphs.english: The young master was guilty of accidental murder, not of premeditated murder. The order to seize the culprit had already been issued, but no approval had yet been given. The young master's earlier statement had been inadequate. After the order was approved, we would summon him again, and if he could change his statement, we might be able to clear him. Go quickly to the pawnshop and pledge another five hundred taels of silver, and don't hesitate! Please have confidence, madam, and ask the footman the other questions.
paragraphs.chinese: 大少爷是误杀，不是故意杀人。早些把捉住凶手的公文发下去了，结果还没批下来。大少爷先前的口供说的不好。等公文批下来了再传一次堂，如果能改口，可能就没事了。快去当铺里再押五百两银子，千万别耽搁！请太太放心，其他的问小厮。

paragraphs.original: 宝钗看了，一一念给薛姨妈听了。薛姨妈拭著眼泪，说道：“这么看起来，竟是死活不定了！”宝钗道：“妈妈先别伤心，等著叫进小厮来问明了再说。”一面打发小丫头把小厮叫进来。薛姨妈便问小厮道：“你把大爷的事细说与我听听。”小厮道：“我那一天晚上，听见大爷和二爷说的，把我唬糊涂了。”
paragraphs.english: In the aftermath of hearing this, Bao Chao relayed these words to Auntie Xue. Auntie Xue wiped away her tears and said, "It seems, our son's fate, whether he lives or dies, is truly uncertain!" Bao Chao consoled her, "Auntie, do not be too distressed, first summon the servant, and then discuss after he tells the truth." Meanwhile, she dispatched a maid to summon the servant. Auntie Xue then asked the servant, "Tell me in detail about your family head's matter." The servant replied, "That night, I heard the brothers discussing it, and I was so frightened that I was confused."
paragraphs.chinese:
宝钗听后，将这些话一一告诉了薛姨妈。薛姨妈拭擦着眼泪，道：“看来，我们儿子是死是活，算是没有指望了！”宝钗道：“妈妈不用太伤心，先叫小厮进来，等他说明了实情再说。”一面派丫鬟去叫小厮。薛姨妈便问小厮道：“你详细说说你家大爷的事。”小厮道：“我那天晚上听见他们兄弟俩在说，把我吓得都糊涂了。”

宝钗听完，把这件事原原本本地告诉了薛姨妈。薛姨妈擦了擦眼泪，说：“看来，我们的儿子生死未卜，希望渺茫！”宝钗安慰道：“妈妈不要过于伤心，先叫小厮过来，等他详细说明情况后再讨论。”接着，派丫鬟去把小厮叫来。薛姨妈向小厮询问道：“你详细地告诉我，你家大爷的事到底是怎么回事？”小厮回答说：“那天晚上，我听见他们兄弟俩在讨论这件事，吓得我当时脑子一片空白。”

paragraphs.original: 未知小厮说出什么话来，下回分解。
paragraphs.english: I don't know what that boy said, let's talk about it next time.
paragraphs.chinese: 我不知那小厮说了什么话，下回再说吧。

title: 《贾存周报升郎中任　薛文起复惹放流刑》
